item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: Who doesnt love a great scone with real whipped cream and lashings of jam!! I once went to scone (nsw) and thought it would be funny to order scones at the local cafe. BAD IDEA!! The scone were hard, the cream was fake....from a can and they only had orange marmalade! Not even strawberry jam....moral of the story, just because a town is named Scone, doesnt mean they'll have good scones there!! Now.....do they grown oranges in Orange?
item.content:encoded: Who doesnt love a great scone with real whipped cream and lashings of jam!! I once went to scone (nsw) and thought it would be funny to order scones at the local cafe. BAD IDEA!! The scone were hard, the cream was fake….from a can and they only had orange marmalade! Not even strawberry jam….moral of the story, just because a town is named Scone, doesnt mean they’ll have good scones there!! Now…..do they grown oranges in Orange?
